content: this quick crochet pillow pattern uses jumbo yarn and one simple stitch to create a project that can be completed in one afternoon so easy and with this jumbo yarn it s nice and squishy too you will crochet two panels and then sew them together to create a pillow cover please note that there is an ad-free pdf version of this pattern available for purchase in my ravelry shop to view the free version go to https //www caabcrochet com/quick-crochet-pillow-free-pattern/ materials lion brand let s get cozy i like big yarn weight 7 jumbo 100% acrylic 66yds/60m 17 6oz/500g rosebud 2 skeins us s/ 19 mm crochet hook 14 x 14 pillow insert yarn needle scissors finished size 14 x 14 stitches & abbreviations used chain chain st stitch skip skip slip_stitch slip_stitch single_crochet single_crochet single_crochet flo single_crochet front loop only
